name: riflesso
title: Riflesso
desc: A refined portfolio theme for photographers and visual studios.
article:
A Swiss-style, grid-based template for photographers who want elegant structure without visual noise.

Features

  • Blog Tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
